title: Bug 14197: Removing a working set immediately applies changes
description: When removing a working set, the package view immediately refilters in the background. This behavior should be changed so that the refiltering only happens when closing the working set selection dialog, not during the manipulation. Additionally, pressing cancel should cancel the removal of the working set and revert any changes made to it.
OB: When I remove a working set, the package view is immediately refiltered.
EB: When I remove a working set, the package view should not be immediately refiltered. It should only refilter when I close the working set selection dialog.
SR: To reproduce this issue:     1. Open the working set selection dialog.     2. Select a working set and choose to remove it     3. Observe that the package view is immediately refiltered     Expected behavior:     The package view should not be immediately refiltered when removing a working set, but only when closing the working set selection dialog. Moreover, pressing cancel should cancel the removal and revert any changes made to the working set.
